nodes.bodyText:
A GQLField cannot represent exactly a list of field because:
{
  name @include(if: $condition1)
  name @include(if: $condition2)
}

is not equivalent to
  name @include(if: $condition1) @include(if: $condition2)

We could use another "IR" there that can represent these cases. That felt a bit overkill just for this use case but maybe there can be other uses too.
